page.title: 02Collingb'rne/Everleigh Shops
page.content: The largest of the thatched properties in Collingbourne Kingston is the Post Office and General Stores. Once the bakery, the faggot_burning ovens are still to be seen. In spite of the villagers increased mobility the tiny complex still meets a very real need. Newspapers,magazines as well as groceries are also available here. The Post Office at Everleigh, a long standing family business is still managed by the elderly Post Mistress despite being burgled in l984. The village stores was closed some three years ago. There is a mail collection point in each of the villages with twice daily collections. Postal deliveries are made daily the new houses, and twice daily to older properties.
